room_title: Escape room "Clue Dunnit?" by The Clue Room in Denver
review: Really great experience. The room was challenging and very well thought out. The host was fun and added to the experience. I highly recommend this adventure.

room_title: Escape room "Clue Dunnit?" by The Clue Room in Denver
review: This was a little bit pricey, and we found out that we are not all team players, but we had fun! A couple of our group had previously done an escape room, so we did an intermediate level room. Bad idea! We used all of our clues plus some! The staff member was very nice and accommodating, though and we did solve it with seconds to spare. This being my first one, I have nothing to compare it to, but the 2 that had done it before said this one was harder but still fun. It definitely put our problem solving and puzzle skills to the test!

room_title: Escape room "Clue Dunnit?" by The Clue Room in Denver
review: Elisa and the team were amazing! We had a corporate event scheduled at The Clue Room and had a fantastic time. Thank you very much!
